Applications:
1998 to 2001 Dodge Ram 1500 or 2500 with a 5.2L or 5.9L engine, fits all wheelbases.

Features:
For the person who wants a single exit exhaust system with all the benefits that a Flowmaster Cat-back exhaust system provides. SOS. (Single out side) systems are the perfect choice. Force II systems deliver a moderate exterior tone and moderate to mild interior tone, and are suited to customers looking for efficiency improvements without a lot of noise. Especially recommended for towing applications. Like all Flowmaster systems, the benefits include improved throttle response, power and mileage. Designed for an easy fit, these systems include all necessary parts and hardware for easy installation.
✓ Mandrel bent 16 gauge 409 stainless tubing
✓ Moderate exterior exhaust tone
✓ Includes hangers and hardware for easy installation
✓ Connects after factory catalytic converter
✓ Dyno tuned for maximum performance
✓ Premium Flowmaster quality
asset.author: Flowmaster Inc
